sentences.en: A clay mould is used for casting bronze statues.
sentences.cn: 用黏土模具来浇铸青铜塑像。

sentences.en: Another method, used especially for figures, was to pour the clay into a mould.
sentences.cn: 另一个方法是把黏土倒入模具中，尤其用于铸造人像。

sentences.en: Clothes mould in wet weather.
sentences.cn: 天气潮湿时衣服会发霉。

sentences.en: He cut the mould off a piece of cheese.
sentences.cn: 他把霉菌从奶酪上切掉。

sentences.en: He is a man of gentle mould.
sentences.cn: 他是个性格温和的人.

sentences.en: his work did much to break the mould of the old urban sociology.
sentences.cn: 他的工作对于打破旧的城市社会学模式起了很大作用。

sentences.en: If damp, musty buildings make you ill, mould is probably the cause.
sentences.cn: 如果潮湿发霉的建筑令你生病了，霉菌很可能是病因。

sentences.en: lime jell-o in a mould
sentences.cn: 装在果冻模里的来檬果冻

sentences.en: Memorial services have become tedious and expected. I would like to help break the mould.
sentences.cn: 纪念仪式已变得令人生厌且毫无新意，我想为打破这种既有模式做点什么。

sentences.en: Mould spreads quickly and can cover something completely.
sentences.cn: 霉蔓延得很快,有时会完全覆盖发霉物体的表面.

sentences.en: Mould the sausage meat into little balls.
sentences.cn: 把灌香肠用的碎肉捏成小丸子。

sentences.en: moulded plastic chairs
sentences.cn: 模制塑料椅

sentences.en: Plants must be covered with a leaf-mould or similarly protected if frost threatens.
sentences.cn: 如果霜冻来临，植物必须盖上腐叶土或用类似方法加以保护。

sentences.en: Spoon the mixture carefully into the mould.
sentences.cn: 用勺小心地把混合物舀起，倒入模具内。

sentences.en: Such oil can contain carcinogens and toxic mould.
sentences.cn: 这种油可能包含致癌物和有毒的霉。

sentences.en: The chemical was used to kill a mold that grows on peanuts.
sentences.cn: 这种化学品被用来杀灭花生上生长的霉菌。

sentences.en: The walls were black with mould.
sentences.cn: 墙上发了霉，黑乎乎的。

sentences.en: There is a film of mould over the bottle cap.
sentences.cn: 瓶盖上有一层薄薄的霉菌.

sentences.en: They learned to mould bronze into statues.
sentences.cn: 他们学会了铸铜像.

sentences.en: This is a mould of pudding.
sentences.cn: 这是在模子中做成的布丁.

sentences.en: Using 2 spoons, mould the cheese into small balls or ovals.
sentences.cn: 用两把勺子将奶酪滚成小球形或椭圆形。

sentences.en: Using 2 spoons, mould the cheese mixture into small balls or ovals.
sentences.cn: 用两把小匙将奶酪混合物塑成圆球或椭圆球形状。

sentences.en: We can mould the dress to your figure.
sentences.cn: 我们能把这件衣服做得合你的身.

sentences.en: When they first started, they said they were going to break the mould of British politics.
sentences.cn: 刚开始时他们说他们将打破英国政治的原有格局。

words.tran_cn: 塑造（mould的ing形式）；用模子制作

phrases.tran_cn: 打破常规，摆脱条条框框
石墨模子，石墨模具；石墨模

trans.tran_en: a hollow container that you pour a liquid or soft substance into, so that when it becomes solid, it takes the shape of the container
to become or cause to become covered with this growth

trans.tran_cn: 用模子做，形成，陶冶，训练（人格），用土覆盖
trans.tran_en: to shape a soft substance by pressing or rolling it or by putting it into a mould
